messageBody:
safamack wrote:

> Hello Everyone:
>
> I have a method called getConnection that retrieves a connection from
> a buffer pool within a webshpere server (my project resides in a
> wsad), When the method is called from within a jsp or a servlet that
> runs on the server, it works fine. However, when I call this method
> from within a Junit testcase (that resides in the same workspace),
> it fails despite the fact that the server is still up and running.
> Can anyone help me with this?

This is a WebSphere problem. If you don't run your test deployed on the
server you don't have access to the correct default JNDI configuration
values. Look at the WebSphere infocenter for more information.

A quick solution is to configure your tests to run as a J2EE Client
Application inside the container. Again, consult the WebSphere
documentation for details.
